articles.title: Ahead of Market: 10 things that will decide D-Street action on Wednesday - The Economic Times
articles.description: European shares rose on Tuesday as investors rebuffed concerns over surprise output cuts by the OPEC and its allies, while awaiting eurozone producer prices for more clues on the European Central Bank's (ECBs) monetary tightening path.
